MainPanel.Item: Design and release your own software
See a list of products you own
Take on contract work. Developing software can get expensive, take on contract work to make some quick money on the side
Manage your servers and redelegate processes
See a list of your employees
Look for, interview and hire new employees
Manage your teams, set working hours and delegate responsibility
Hire or call staff to make sure your facilities are top notch
Buy and sell stocks, there is a lot of money to be made here
If you are running into problems, you might want to consider taking up a loan
Review a list of all software ever released
Keep yourself updated on current events and product reviews
Manage how you want to distribute your software
Toggle all furniture that is stuck to the ceiling
Toggle labels over rooms, specifying the team they belong to and which usage limitations apply
Use this to connect your servers
Click here to make room color reflect the current status of the room
Click here to toggle build mode, in which you can construct and furnish your office(s) and build roads and parking
If no one is around, you can skip until someone arrives
Build rooms, doors, elevators and windows
Put various furniture in your rooms to make them functional

DesignWindow.Item: Have all code synchronized in one place, which reduces bugs and makes your programmers more efficient during the alpha phase. Requires a server.
Make this product a sequel to another one of your products
Click here to generate a random name
Release your product for free to gain popularity and put a strain on your competitors
Keep this product to yourself, so your competitors can't take advantage of it

AutoWindow.Item: To enable this, the team leader must have taken a course in project management through the education program
To enable this, the team leader must have taken a course in HR management through the education program

EducationWindow.Item: Project management allows a leader to take over a development cycle by automatically designing new products and delegating work to specific teams.
HR management allows a leader to take over HR responsibilities, like hiring, firing, settling disputes, raises and education.

StaffWindow.Item: {0} up front Up to {0} per repair

OptionsWindow.Item: Will automatically skip to the next arrival of an employee if there is no one present
Saves once per month without overwriting the main save file
Will pan the camera when the mouse sits at the edge of the screen
Waits for your screen's refresh rate to render a frame. Removes screen tearing and ensures your graphics card won't waste time rendering frames you can't see.
The exterior environment casts shadows based on the sun's position
Every light in the game casts shadows (Requires a high-end graphics card)
Adds shadows to corners and crevices
Blurs the top and bottom part of the screen to give a miniature effect
Adds a slight glow and increases color strength

Thoughts.Item: I have too many jobs at once
I'm not happy with how the last wage negotiations went
I'm very happy with my salary
The room is nice and quiet
I didn't get the salary I wanted

Warnings.Item: Some employees are unhappy with their job
An employee is hungry and is having trouble working
An employee has to pee and is having trouble working
An employee is tired and can't work
An employee is freezing
An employee is hot
An employee stumbling in the dark. Build more lamps or windows
A room is dirty and needs cleaning up
An employee is complaining about a slow computer. Make sure computers are in top shape by hiring IT support
An employee is having trouble concentrating due to noise. Reduce all sources of noise in a room or build cubicles
There are too many teams in one of your rooms. Make sure employees don't have to walk through other teams' offices
You can't afford this
The busses are filling up, consider building parking
Click and drag
There is no way to get in to this room Add doors or elevators
Employees won't use toilets in public Separate toilets in to other rooms or remove large windows and openings
There are a lot of computers in this room Overcrowded rooms can distract employees
There is not enough light here Add windows or lamps
Some inventory broke and needs maintenance
The structure is not supported
You can't build within other rooms. If you want to split a room you have to build from wall to wall
You have to build within your plot boundaries
Your rooms have to be at least 2x2

You have to place this on a room boundary
You have to place furniture inside your rooms

You have to place this on an unoccupied table

You have to place this at a table

Left click a server to select it and then left click another server to connect them.
Left click anywhere else or double click to disconnect the server.

Alpha4.1.Item: Are you sure you want to
Increases the ability to bring together a team, boost their efficiency and handle management tasks
Increases programming speed, code quality and how quickly bugs are fixed
Increases the speed of writing documentation and requirement specifications and the ability to avoid needless complexity
Increases how fast the artist works, the quality of the art and decreases the amount of flaws
Increases the effectiveness and speed of marketing campaigns
Some of your electronics are being affected by the heat
Put ventilators in full cool mode to preserve electronics

Alpha4.3.Item: If a product is affecting your reputation or you can't support it, it might be a good idea to pull it off the market. It can affect your reputation.

Upcoming events
Click here to see a list of events coming up next month. The icon will glow red if very important events are happening.
{0} from team {1} will retire next month, after working for {2} for {3} years.
{0} have planned vacations next month and {1} employees are scheduled to hold their vacation.
No teams have planned vacations next month but {0} employees are scheduled to hold their vacation.
{0} plans to release a product of type {1} called "{2}" next month.
An error occurred!
Click here for details

I'm sorry to inform you that an error occurred just now, which might cause the game to break or become unstable (Early access, right?). If you have a recent save, I would suggest closing the game, re-opening it and then loading it, as you might not be able to save the current game as of now. If you have an idea of what happened based on the error message (click the "See error" button to check) and you can reproduce it, I would be very grateful if you could send a mail to SoftwareInc@Coredumping.com with a description of the error, so that I may fix it. I'm very sorry for the inconvenience.

Alpha7.1.Item: Fans have no direct impact on your sales, but having more fans will make it easier to gain market recognition.
Click here to use the suggested price for this software
Your market recognition controls how well known you are in each software market and therefore how well your products will sell in each category
Makes most shiny surfaces reflect their surroundings (Requires a high-end graphics card)
Error taking picture. Please pick a smaller resolution.
The performance of most of the effects depend on your screen resolution and not the complexity of the objects on the screen. SSAA will double the performance impact of most of the effects.
Do you want to start a marketing campaign for {0} now? Marketing your product while it is under development will generate hype, which affects your launch sales and your competitors
There is already a marketing campaign for this product
"{0}" is already bound to "{1}", are you sure you want to rebind?
The game you're trying to load is from an older version of Software Inc. ({0}), which is no longer compatible with the version you are using ({1})

Alpha7.2.Item: Fast Approximate Anti-Aliasing, basic anti-aliasing. Keeps edges from looking pixelated
Subpixel Morphological Anti-Aliasing, more advanced anti-aliasing. Keeps edges from looking pixelated
Subpixel Morphological Anti-Aliasing, not supported on DirectX9
Super-Sampling Anti-Aliasing. Renders the game in higher resolution to smooth out edges as much as possible (Requires a high-end graphics card)
Are you sure you want to cancel {0}?

Alpha7.3.Item: A computer is getting very slow and needs to be looked at by IT support staff

Alpha7.6.Item: You have already wasted all your lives
Only recommended for small projects when starting out

Click to start
Connect the boxes until all boxes in a group show 0
You can't connect the same boxes twice
You can make loops
Don't let a box get to the center

Click to start
Type the words on the screen
You have to type the entire word once you start typing, you can't delete a letter
When you complete a word, your score multiplier increases
The multiplier resets when you mistype a letter or when a word reaches the bottom
Don't let the words reach the bottom

Alpha7.7.Item: Are you sure you want to look again? It will cost {0}

Alpha8.1.Item: This feature depends on {0}, please select that feature first
This feature depends on {0} from {1}, which has not unlocked yet
This feature depends on {0} from {1}, which is not available on the market
This feature depends on {0}, which is not available for the {1} you have picked
All supported operating systems must have {0} to unlock this feature
Research and patent features to make royalties off your competitors
Are you sure you want to cancel this research? You will lose all progress
Your patent on {1} for {0} has expired
Another company has finished researching {1} from {0} before you

Alpha8.2.Item: There is currently nothing to research

Alpha8.3.Item: Wall angle has to be larger than {0}
You can assign employees to furniture by holding shift and selecting both the employee(s) and the furniture and then right clicking
You can assign staff to rooms by holding shift and selecting both the staff member(s) and the room(s) and then right clicking
You can keep placing objects and rooms in build mode by holding shift, this also works when duplicating objects
You can easily select multiple objects of a specific type by holding ctrl and the left mouse button while dragging the mouse
The select furniture type option is extremely versatile, you can use it to select all furniture in a room or the selected furniture type(s) in the selected room(s)
You can easily copy furniture color by setting the default style and then resetting style for selected furniture from the context menu
Keep an eye on upcoming and recently released products before releasing your own to avoid getting overshadowed
You can copy multiple objects in an arrangement at a time by holding shift and selecting them before duplicating
You can educate multiple employees at a time by having them all selected before you open the education window
You can hold ctrl and click to select multiple employees or hold shift to select a range of employees, which also works for some other lists in the game
For some wall segments, you can hold ctrl to auto scale the segment to fit the wall you want to build it on

Alpha8.4.Item: You can select elevators in build mode to show a guiding beam, which will help you align elevators on other floors
HR for team {0} does not have a budget big enough to hire more employees
This product is not operating system dependant
This software depends on {1} to be developed. Please select a product of type {1} to continue
You need at least one feature to begin development

Alpha8.5.Item: You can use the "Anchor grid" button, above the build button on the left, to snap the grid to a wall. This makes it a lot easier to align furniture to angled walls

Alpha8.6.Item: Click here to start uploading your mods to the Steam Workshop
Failed uploading mod with error code: {0}
Mod uploaded successfully! Remember to change the visibility of your mod in the workshop.

Found file of type {0}. Please only upload relevant files
Are you sure you want to upload this to the Steam Workshop? Please refrain from uploading work that is not yours.
You can left click and drag work items to re-order them in the list. You can right click a work item to collapse it.

Alpha8.7.Item: Please pick a name for your blueprint
Choose from a list of pre-made and pre-furnished buildings
Please unsubscribe from this item in the Steam Workshop. If you uploaded this to the Workshop, please delete it manually from the Blueprints folder.

Alpha8.8.Item: Would you like to begin the {0} tutorial?
Are you sure you want to cancel the tutorial?
The selected mod is not compatible with the other mods selected

Alpha8.9.Item: An employee is stressed. Make sure you don't overwork them with too many tasks and long working hours, build a canteen and send them home when they are completely stressed out
An employee is not having their social needs met. An open working environment, canteens, team meetings and furniture for socializing can help
A good leader needs to be social, but an independent employee will happily work all day by themselves in their booths
A lazy employee will try to get out of work as much as possible, whereas a stressed employee will quickly feel overworked
A hard worker always gives it 110%, but a fast learner will pick up new skills more easily
You are about to start developing an in-house product, which means you won't be able to sell it or license it. Are you sure you want to continue?
Press {0} or {1} to rotate the building

Alpha8.10.Item: Something is blocking your cleaning staff from cleaning this room
Putting more people on a project than needed does not necessarily make development faster and might actually decrease effectiveness
You can configure a keyboard shortcut to fire employees and destroy objects. The default is the DELETE key

This split would result in unsupported rooms
Failed activating mod. Check log for details.
Are you sure you want to delete the blueprint: {0}?
You can change lighting conditions in build mode in the bottom left corner below the categories. This will also allow you to see your lamps in action.
You can't redelegate a server process to the server it is already on
Please enter a valid e-mail address or leave the field empty
Failed sending report. Do you want try again later? Error:
Please write at least 50 letters in your message
The game has detected a crash on your last run, do you want to notify the developer now?
The game has detected an error, do you want to notify the developer now?
(OPTIONAL) Lets me contact you for further info
Enter your message to the developer here
Your report has been saved and will retry the next time you launch the game
You can only send a report once every 5 minutes

Failed saving game. The game will continue, but you might experience weird behavior or loss of data. The error has been logged. Do you wish to additionally send an error report to the developer? Sorry for the inconvenience.

Failed loading game. The game will continue, but you might experience weird behavior or loss of data. The error has been logged. Do you wish to additionally send an error report to the developer? Sorry for the inconvenience.

Alpha8.11.Item: A furniture named {0} was not present on your computer. The game will have to load your save file without this furniture, which might break the game.
{0} is willing to offer {1}, do you want to take their offer? You bought the stock for {2} and it is currently worth {3}
This room is not accessible from the outside Please connect it using doors, elevators or stairs
You are about to load the backup version of your save file. Are you sure this is what you want to do?

Alpha9.1.Item: Who do you want to handle the peer review? Please note that outsourcing will cost {0} per review.

A press release tells the world about your product. A press release will be more effective the more you have to show off, so you should wait a bit into the design or development phases before making a press release. Each press releases will decrease the effect of the next one, so you should use it sparingly.

You can send of an early copy of your product to the press to gain a lot of followers quickly. If the press doesn't like your product you could lose followers just as quickly, so be careful. The response to your demo will appear in the newspaper the day after it has been released.
It's a good idea to maintain hype once you've gained followers, so they don't forget about your product. Hyping your product will slow follower decline if they start losing interest.

You should focus on getting your product mentioned as much as possible in the media once it is released. Marketing is an endless money sink and you're competing for attention with your direct competitors all the time. Set a budget to make sure you don't run out of money or leave it at 0 if you don't want to limit spending.
You have no marketing options available for this product
You can't release this product before you've released all operating systems it supports
Are you sure you want to promote this project to the development phase? Bad designs can lead to bad quality products, bugs and delays
Gives panels in the main HUD a frosted look
Activate this to make the leader come up with new products based on the last product released
Whether the leader should only create sequels to past projects rather than creating new IP
How long to keep each project in development relative to the optimal time it would take to develop
You currently don't have any running project management tasks
Click here to assign this project to a project management task
Let the project manager handle post marketing and setting the budget
Each managerial decision requires action points, which the leader will work to acquire. Leader skill determines how many can be acquired and role specific skills determine the speed.
Whether leader should try solely sticking to in-house licenses when creating new projects
Whether leader should stick to one IP, forcing them to wait if a sequel is already being developed
You need to pick a leader before you can continue
There are no leaders to choose from. Please hire a leader or make one of your current employees a leader
Your company is in debt! You have until {0} to correct your financial situation or your company will be forced to declare bankruptcy
Congratulations! 24 hours have gone and your company has been cleared of debt
Peer reviews are only available during alpha
{0} has cancelled their distribution deal with you because of your inability to provide a stable connection
Please make {0} an offer on how big a revenue cut you will receive for digital sales in percent
Make an offer on digital distribution
You currently take {0}% revenue for digital sales
Are you sure you want to cancel your distribution deal with {0}?
{0} are not interested in your offer
You have to wait at least a month before you can make another offer

In order to sell copies of your product you have to print physical copies. If you don't print any copies of your product, it will only be available digitally. Do you want to print copies now? You can always print new copies in the "Your Releases" window.
There is nowhere for your courier to park. Please build parking spaces on your lot
Manage your product printers and your digital distribution platform
Maintenance staff will ensure your building runs optimally by fixing your furniture. It's a good idea to keep them handy, as they will repair things before they break completely.
Cleaning staff will make sure the floors of your building are clean, thereby improving the work environment and keeping your employees happy
IT staff will fix everything your maintenance staff can't, such as computers, servers and printers
Receptionists will greet guests who are visiting your company to offer deals. You cannot receive deals without receptionists.
Couriers will pick up any products you have printed in storage, so they can be delivered to stores, stocked and sold
Cooks will cook and serve food in a canteen for your employees. You will need to have fridges, stoves and serving plates ready.
Your printers are getting backed up, build more pallets to unload them
You need a server to open your own digital distribution platform
Are you sure you want to open your own digital distribution platform? All digital copies of your products will be sold through your own platform and will require adequate server capacity
Are you sure you want to close your own digital distribution platform? All your distribution deals will be cancelled and will have to be renegotiated
You can't start printing copies until you reach the beta phase
You can only print copies of IP you own
Please enter your license key in the format ####-####-####-####

Not all furniture was replaced as it was blocked by something else
Get an overview of your company's expenditure and income

Monitor sources of noise. Hover over rooms to view exactly how noise is dispersing

A press release has been mentioned.

Are you sure you want to change the release date? You'll have {0} to release your product. Pushing back the release date can make people start unfollowing and it'll be harder to push it back later, if you move it up.

Alpha9.7.Item: Click here to make all assigned furniture red and unassigned furniture gray
Crunch time forces all employees on a team to work a lot faster at the cost of satisfaction. Employees will work slower for a period after the crunch is over, depending on how long it lasted.
{0} has reached alpha but still doesn't have any followers! Make sure you start your marketing efforts early or nobody will buy your product
The {0} team just lost their leader and is no longer under HR management
Are you sure you want to release {0} now?
The supported operating systems for {0} no longer have any users to sell to. Consider porting it to other operating systems if possible
Enable non-essential confirmation dialogs. Only disable this if you are confident you won't miss-click

Alpha9.8.Item: This feature is currently experimental! The game will autosave in case something happens

Alpha9.10.Item: Running this test will quit to the main menu. Are you sure you want to continue?
Make sure your resolution and fullscreen settings are correct, as these will impact the result. Do you want to start the test?
The game will do a small test and pick your graphics settings based on the results
Contract {0} for a net worth of {1}, with {2} quality

The game failed to access the settings.txt file, your settings will not be saved or loaded. This could happen because you don't have permission to edit files, it's locked by antivirus software, it has been marked as read-only or you downloaded the game illegally.
Please enter how many copies you would like to print before the print job is cancelled. -1 means no limit.

Set this to a number above 0 to automatically queue a printing job for each project, which prints the assigned amount of copies when a project hits the beta phase. Add % to the end of the number to print a percentage of the project's followers.
This amount of physical copies will be ordered for sale on release of each product developed Add % to the end of the number to order a percentage of the product's followers.
